a.server_id as serverId, a.groups_id as groupsId, b.groups_name as groupsName, a.type_id as typeId, a.expire, a.asset_coding as assetCoding, c.type_name as typeName, a.os_id as osId, d.os_name as osName, a.cabinet_id as cabinetId, e.cabinet_name as cabinetName, e.cabinet_scope as cabinetScope, e.number, a.user_id as userId, f.user_name as userName, a.service_id as serviceId, g.service_name as serviceName, i.ent_name as entName, h.ip_address as hostIpAddress,
a.memory as memory, a.cpu as cpu, a.host_id as hostId, a.manager_ip as managerIp, a.domain_name as domainName, a.ent_id as entId, a.disk_size as diskSize, a.ip_address as ipAddress, a.open_port as openPort, a.create_time as createTime, a.create_user as createUser, a.last_modify_user as lastModifyUser, a.last_modify_time as lastModifyTime, a.cabinet_level as cabinetLevel, a.status, a.description
mapper.select: select server_id as serverId from cmdb_resource_server WHERE ip_address like concat("%",#{ipAddress},"%")
select ip_address as ipAddress from cmdb_resource_server

select concat(network_prefix,".",ip_subffix) as ipAddress , a.last_modify_time as lastModifyTime from cmdb_resource_network_address a , cmdb_resource_network b where b.network_id=a.ip_prefix_id and a.status=1 and concat(network_prefix,".",ip_subffix) not in (select manager_ip from cmdb_resource_server b where manager_ip!="" union select ip_address from cmdb_resource_server)
select max(server_id) as serverId from cmdb_resource_server
select server_id as serverId from cmdb_resource_server where ip_address=#{ipAddress}
select count(*) as cnt from cmdb_resource_server
select count(*) as cnt from cmdb_resource_server where status=0

select count(*) as cnt from cmdb_resource_network_address a , cmdb_resource_network b where b.network_id=a.ip_prefix_id and a.status=1 and concat(network_prefix,".",ip_subffix) not in (select manager_ip from cmdb_resource_server b where manager_ip!="" union select ip_address from cmdb_resource_server)

select server_id as serverId , ip_address as hostIpAddress from cmdb_resource_server where type_id=(select b.depend from cmdb_resource_server a, cmdb_resource_server_type b where a.type_id=b.type_id and a.server_id=#{serverId})
mapper.insert: insert into cmdb_resource_server( server_id, groups_id, type_id, os_id, cabinet_id, user_id, service_id, memory, cpu, host_id, manager_ip, domain_name, ent_id, disk_size, ip_address, open_port, create_time, create_user, last_modify_user, cabinet_level, description, expire, asset_coding ) values( #{serverId}, #{groupsId}, #{typeId}, #{osId}, #{cabinetId}, #{userId}, #{serviceId}, #{memory}, #{cpu}, #{hostId}, #{managerIp}, #{domainName}, #{entId}, #{diskSize}, #{ipAddress}, #{openPort}, #{createTime}, #{createUser}, #{lastModifyUser}, #{cabinetLevel}, #{description}, #{expire}, #{assetCoding} )
mapper.update:
update cmdb_resource_server set
server_id=#{serverId}, groups_id=#{groupsId}, type_id=#{typeId}, os_id=#{osId}, cabinet_id=#{cabinetId}, user_id=#{userId}, service_id=#{serviceId}, memory=#{memory}, cpu=#{cpu}, host_id=#{hostId}, manager_ip=#{managerIp}, domain_name=#{domainName}, ent_id=#{entId}, disk_size=#{diskSize}, ip_address=#{ipAddress}, open_port=#{openPort}, asset_coding=#{assetCoding}, expire=#{expire},
create_time=#{createTime},
create_user=#{createUser},
last_modify_user=#{lastModifyUser}, cabinet_level=#{cabinetLevel},

server_id=#{serverId} where server_id=#{serverId}
mapper.select:
select count(distinct server_id) cnt ,
substr(from_unixtime(create_time,"%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S"), 1,7) as dates
substr(from_unixtime(create_time,"%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S"), 1,10) as dates
from cmdb_resource_server
from_unixtime(create_time,"%Y")=#{dates}
from_unixtime(create_time,"%Y-%m")=#{dates}
group by dates order by 2
select cabinet_level as cabinetLevel from cmdb_resource_server where cabinet_id>1 and cabinet_id=#{cabinetId}

select
from cmdb_resource_server a, cmdb_resource_groups b, cmdb_resource_server_type c, cmdb_resource_os_type d, cmdb_resource_cabinet e, cmdb_resource_user f, cmdb_resource_service g, cmdb_resource_server h, cmdb_resource_entname i where a.groups_id = b.groups_id and a.type_id = c.type_id and a.os_id = d.os_id and a.cabinet_id = e.cabinet_id and a.user_id = f.user_id and a.service_id = g.service_id and a.host_id = h.server_id and a.ent_id = i.ent_id and a.cabinet_id > 1 order by a.cabinet_level desc
select b.ent_name as typeName, count(a.service_id) as cnt from cmdb_resource_server a, cmdb_resource_entname b where a.ent_id=b.ent_id group by b.ent_name order by cnt desc
select disk_size as typeName , count(*) as cnt from cmdb_resource_server group by disk_size
select memory as typeName , count(*) as cnt from cmdb_resource_server group by memory
